name: Chick Chain
description:
Collect the eggs to build a family. You know what they say: step on a crack, break your mother's back! Find a lucky penny to get a rest from the cars.

Controls

Start with the space bar and move with WASD or the arrow keys. Controllers are supported.

Credits

  • Devin Hilpert
  • Adam Kruchkow
  • Greg Weil
